attributes.action: Allow all dogs to be able to cross the channel by Eurostar train
attributes.additional_details: Please all the dog lovers and anyone else help and vote we need at list 10.0000 to get started.
attributes.background: I am opening this because I think it would be so much easier for people with dogs to be allowed to use the Eurostar train to travel to Europe from London . Lots of people would love to take there dogs with them on a journey but not be able to use Eurostar makes it very difficult. So please vote.

rejection.details: This is a decision taken by Eurostar, not the UK Government or Parliament.
